headline: PPL to Pay Quarterly Stock Dividend Jan. 2, 2025
summary: PPL Corporation (NYSE: PPL) declared a quarterly common stock dividend on Friday, Nov. 22, 2024, of $0.2575 per share, payable Jan. 2, 2025 to shareowners of record as of Dec.10, 2024.
